briefdescription.para: Sets the soc data saved in the backup SRAM.

parameterdescription.para: pointer where the soc data is stored

briefdescription.para: Gets the soc data saved in the backup SRAM.
Sets the number of opening/closing events of the contactors saved in the backup SRAM.

parameterdescription.para: pointer where the contactor events are stored

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of opening/closing events of the contactors saved in the backup SRAM.

parameterdescription.para: pointer where the contactor event data should be stored to

briefdescription.para: increments the operating hours timer os_operating_hours

detaileddescription.para: The operating_hours is a runtime-counter, counting the operating time since the last manual(!) reset of the timer.

briefdescription.para: saves operating hours data into the non-volatile memory (NVM)
Gets the operating hours from the non-volatile memory (NVM)

parameterdescription.para: pointer to destination buffer where the stored operating hours are copied
